channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Intel’s stock is so cheap compared to TSMC’s — and this analyst now says ‘buy’
item.description: Melius Research says Intel’s foundry business may start getting more respect, and that could give the stock a further boost.

item.title: Micron’s stock is an S&P 500 standout by this metric, as memory prices boom
item.description: Looking across the S&P 500 at unreported fiscal years, no company is expected to grow revenue faster than Micron.

item.title: ‘He even bragged about his Mercedes-Benz:’ I rejected two egotistical advisers. I managed my life savings and they tripled over 25 years. Did I do OK?
item.description: “We do not take out-of-country or five-star vacations. Instead, we enjoy time with family and friends and hobbies.”

item.title: ‘We track our finances religiously’: Are we obliged to pay for our daughter’s medical school? We have $2.6 million saved for retirement.
item.description: “I am retired, and my wife is an employed physician. She is 56 and would like to retire as well.”

item.title: Trump is forcing the world to share riches with the U.S. — Venezuelan oil is the latest bargaining chip
item.description: How a full-page newspaper advertisement in 1987 became American foreign policy.

item.title: Venezuela chaos could lead to billions in investment opportunities, one consultant says
item.description: One firm says there could be $500 billion in opportunities in Venezuela over the next 10 years.

item.title: One ‘under-the-radar’ sector traders are watching as the U.S. takes action in Venezuela
item.description: Jay Woods highlights three sectors that could benefit from the U.S.-Venezuela crisis.

item.title: Micron is overbought. Using options to hedge against a reversal lower, while keeping upside exposure
item.description: Michael Khouw breaks down this options trade on the memory chipmaker.

item.title: Vanguard likes a 40/60 portfolio for 2026. Where the firm sees higher risk-adjusted returns
item.description: Vanguard sees better risk-adjusted returns over the next decade by leaning away from artificial intelligence stocks and being overweight fixed income.

item.title: Katie Stockton reviews some of Fairlead's best trades of 2025, including Tesla and Estee Lauder
item.description: The turn of the year is a good time to reflect on your methodology, so we reviewed what worked best for us in this forum in 2025.

item.title: Holy Ship! HII Stock Jumps on Trump Navy Ship Plans
item.description: HII stock rises on Trump's Golden Fleet plans for new powerful warships. Explore how navy announcements impact markets, with balanced views on potenti...

item.title: Intuitive Machines Stock Rockets on Analyst Upgrade
item.description: Meta description: Intuitive Machines (LUNR) stock rockets 37% on KeyBanc overweight rating and $20 target amid lunar contract potential. Discover risk...

item.title: Sable Offshore Stock Surges on Trump Admin Pipeline Boost
item.description: Whoa, folks, have you seen what’s happening with Sable Offshore today? This energy player, ticker SOC, is lighting up the charts with one of the bigge...

item.title: DBVT Stock Rockets on Positive Peanut Allergy Patch Trial
item.description: DBVT stock surges as much as 46% on positive Phase 3 results for Viaskin Peanut patch, a potential breakthrough treatment for peanut allergies in youn...

item.title: Trump’s Weed Pivot Ignites CGC Stock Surge
item.description: Canopy Growth (CGC) surges 50%+ as Trump eyes marijuana reclassification. Explore the buzz, risks, and trading lessons in this volatile sector.
